title: Nordstrom's Anniversary Sale Is Filled With Dreamy Wedding Guest Dresses
description: Everything from floral midis to black tie-worthy gowns are up to 60 percent off.
excerpt: Everything from floral midis to black tie-worthy gowns are up to 60 percent off.
text: Tropical BeadingTopshop Cowl Neck Floral Print DressDance the night away in a gown awash in painterly florals. Beaded shoulder straps add a touch of tropical flair—perfect for a destination wedding.Corseted BeautyHouse of CB Bellina Strapless Midi Cocktail DressA signature House of CB cinched bodice and exaggerated bow detail at the back make this strapless midi a true head-turner. Bonus: The bow is detachable, and the dress has hidden pockets for extra versatility.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLela Rose Tapestry Jacquard Seam Detail GownA floral dress is the perfect way to lean into the romantic energy of a summer wedding.Lacy BloomsMango Sky Embroidered Strapless DressThis airy embroidered number is perfect for a garden wedding or seaside ceremony. For an unexpected color play, style it with butter yellow accessories. Playful ruffles collide with a whimsical tie-dye print to create an undeniably romantic dress.Carolina Herrera Long Sleeve Cutout Waist Column GownHere’s a jaw-dropping dress that made its debut at Carolina Herrera’s Spring 2025 runway show. Next stop: the fancy wedding on your calendar.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSonya Moda Nayla Mixed Media Strapless GownSometimes less certainly is more. Lean into the timeless allure of an all-black dress for an effortless statement.High-ImpactMac Duggal Foldover Slit GownFinding a black tie-ready gown doesn't have to be stressful. This ruched navy number oozes elegance, complete with a thigh-high slit for subtle sex appeal. Plus, the pleated design will move with you effortlessly all night.Pretty In PinkAlice + Olivia Erna Tie Back Ruffle Sleeveless MinidressThis flouncy Alice + Olivia mini is perfect for daytime ceremonies that turn into all-night parties. Pair it with statement heels and a bold bag for a full-on maximalist moment.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowCovetable ContrastNocturne Off-Shoulder Contrast DressWhile a slight chill in the air can feel romantic, it rarely bodes well for sleeveless styles. This off-the-shoulder number, finished with a contrasting foldover detail, offers both warmth and sartorial drama.Pop of ColorWayf Irene Halter Neck Satin SlipdressYou can never go wrong with a classic slip dress. With its draped halter neckline, this stunning midi offers near-endless styling possibilities.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowDarling DotsASTR the Label Maeve Midi DressLooking for a dress that works for both weddings and vacation? Opt for this pleated midi, featuring a ruched bodice and the polka dot print du jour.Versatile MiniSteve Madden Bordeaux Off the Shoulder MinidressWhen in doubt, an LBD always fits a cocktail dress code. We're not sure what we love most about this one—the voluminous sleeves, off-the-shoulder neckline, or the under-$50 price tag.
html:
Tropical Beading

Topshop Cowl Neck Floral Print Dress

Dance the night away in a gown awash in painterly florals. Beaded shoulder straps add a touch of tropical flair—perfect for a destination wedding.

Corseted Beauty

House of CB Bellina Strapless Midi Cocktail Dress

A signature House of CB cinched bodice and exaggerated bow detail at the back make this strapless midi a true head-turner. Bonus: The bow is detachable, and the dress has hidden pockets for extra versatility.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Lela Rose Tapestry Jacquard Seam Detail Gown

A floral dress is the perfect way to lean into the romantic energy of a summer wedding.

Lacy Blooms

Mango Sky Embroidered Strapless Dress

This airy embroidered number is perfect for a garden wedding or seaside ceremony. For an unexpected color play, style it with butter yellow accessories.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zimmermann Illuminate Flounce Ruffle Gown

Turn up the glamour with a voluminous dress by Zimmermann. Playful ruffles collide with a whimsical tie-dye print to create an undeniably romantic dress.

Carolina Herrera Long Sleeve Cutout Waist Column Gown

Here’s a jaw-dropping dress that made its debut at Carolina Herrera’s Spring 2025 runway show. Next stop: the fancy wedding on your calendar.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sonya Moda Nayla Mixed Media Strapless Gown

Sometimes less certainly is more. Lean into the timeless allure of an all-black dress for an effortless statement.

High-Impact

Mac Duggal Foldover Slit Gown

Finding a black tie-ready gown doesn't have to be stressful. This ruched navy number oozes elegance, complete with a thigh-high slit for subtle sex appeal.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Autumnal Vibes

Petal & Pup Naira Pleated Maxi Dress

This copper-orange maxi will pop in all your summer wedding photos and work beautifully for fall fêtes, too. Plus, the pleated design will move with you effortlessly all night.

Pretty In Pink

Alice + Olivia Erna Tie Back Ruffle Sleeveless Minidress

This flouncy Alice + Olivia mini is perfect for daytime ceremonies that turn into all-night parties. Pair it with statement heels and a bold bag for a full-on maximalist moment.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Covetable Contrast

Nocturne Off-Shoulder Contrast Dress

While a slight chill in the air can feel romantic, it rarely bodes well for sleeveless styles. This off-the-shoulder number, finished with a contrasting foldover detail, offers both warmth and sartorial drama.

Pop of Color

Wayf Irene Halter Neck Satin Slipdress

You can never go wrong with a classic slip dress. With its draped halter neckline, this stunning midi offers near-endless styling possibilities.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Darling Dots

ASTR the Label Maeve Midi Dress

Looking for a dress that works for both weddings and vacation? Opt for this pleated midi, featuring a ruched bodice and the polka dot print du jour.

Versatile Mini

Steve Madden Bordeaux Off the Shoulder Minidress

When in doubt, an LBD always fits a cocktail dress code. We're not sure what we love most about this one—the voluminous sleeves, off-the-shoulder neckline, or the under-$50 price tag.
